node.statement: PART 4 (Turaev-Viro connection): In the large-j semiclassical limit, the non-melonic corrections to the q-deformed model are controlled by quantum 6j symbols. When q = exp(2pi i/r) is a root of unity, these give the Turaev-Viro state sum invariants of 3-manifolds, generalizing the Ponzano-Regge/3D-gravity connection of the undeformed (q=1) BLM model. This provides a direct link between the q-BLM model and 3D Chern-Simons/topological gravity.
